Thanks Nicolai - that's great. Not a GUI, but still great :-).

I know that=
 boost::graph can read these files - have you (or anyone else) tried conver=
ting boost::graph structures into NEAT networks?

Cheers,

Evert

--- In ne=

hoogroups.com, "evertwh2004" <evert@> wrote:

ilable visualisation tools or code?

> it is possible to visualize n=
etworks with graphviz, together with gifview program from gifsicle tools fo=
r gif animation.
> here is an example of a network in .dot language, you ru=
n it with command: dot -Tgif test1.dot |gifview

>=

> 	rankdir=3DTB;
> 	constraint=3Dfalse;
> 	ranksep=3D"0.5 eq=
ualy";
